comments.body: also - when I install the typings for node they are in /// <reference path="../node/**index**.d.ts" />. Could you have a look at that?

I cannot find any other definition file which refers to an `../node/index.d.ts` and as far as I know the node definitions should be in `../node/` with version number sufficies.

I would suggest reverting to `../node/node.d.ts` as this works for both the CI tool as well as a clean setup.
